Appeal For a Balanced Work 
     Dear Brother and Sister Irwin:  A happy new year to you. . . . I am so very much interested in the work that I have told you was presented before me. I saw large companies and small companies stretching out their hands and saying, "Come and help us. We want you to open to us the word of God." In all my experiences I have not seen so general inquiring interest to be taught the truth. There have been some backsets, but the Lord has not left His people. . . .
